Metadata.title: Emin Bugra Saral
Metadata.description: Personal website of Emin Bugra Saral.
Metadata.name: Emin Bugra Saral

Info.title: intro
Info.text:
Birth: September 28, 1988. Of / Trabzon / Türkiye.

Education: Bachelor in Computer Science, Koç University, Istanbul.

Work Experience: Software Programming, Project Management.

Current Status: Looking for a job. Switching from software engineering to any kind of art or management positions.

Talents: Fast learner, visionary leading, mentorship, creative ideation, problem solving, attention to detail, writing, acting, directing, photography, pencil drawing, dancing.

Lived in: Istanbul (Türkiye), Bordeaux (France), San Jose (USA), Munich (Germany), Trabzon (Türkiye).

Visited: USA, France, Netherlands, Belgium, Italy, Germany, Austria, Portugal.

TouchSensei.title: Touch Sensei (mobile game)
TouchSensei.text: Join Touch Sensei on an emotional journey! Move your finger to unlock feelings, discover secrets, and explore a world of unique textures. Try it now.

EBSLifeSolutions.title: EBS Life Solutions - not active yet
EBSLifeSolutions.text: I offer a professional and compassionate approach to overcoming life’s challenges, grounded in over 20 years of rich personal experience. Here, lessons learned become lessons shared. :)

Blog.title: Blog (www.saral.blog) - To be continued...
Blog.text: A sincere and honest collection of content where my essays, poems, stories, and ideas are reflected outward. I have decided to end this blogging journey to focus on bringing my ideas and projects, along with their details, into my professional career.

Medium.title: Old Blog (medium.com/@ebsaral) - Only in English
Medium.text: A collection of content that was written without enough care and is no longer being updated.

SoundCloud.title: SoundCloud (@ebsaral)
SoundCloud.text: A platform where I amateurishly reflect my interest in music.

DeviantArt.title: DeviantArt (@eminbugrasaral)
DeviantArt.text: A personal gallery where I reflect my interest in photography and drawing.

Flickr.title: Flickr (@eminbugrasaral)
Flickr.text: A personal photo collection that I mainly use to archive old photographs.

Vimeo.title: Vimeo (@rahmetli)
Vimeo.text: A few old videos with deep memories attached.

LinkedIn.title: LinkedIn (@eminbugrasaral)
LinkedIn.text: A gathering place for white-collar workers where I don't try too hard to appear professional.

Github.title: GitHub (@ebsaral)
Github.text: A platform where many of my software projects are hosted.

DevTo.title: Dev.to (@ebsaral)
DevTo.text: Some technical shares that come from my pen about software programming.

Stackoverflow.title: Stackoverflow
Stackoverflow.text: A platform that facilitates collaboration among developers.

Instagram.title: Instagram (@eminbugrasaral)
Instagram.text: A photo and story gallery where I make heartfelt shares according to my mood, without using too many filters.

Twitter.title: Twitter / X (@cbsaral)
Twitter.text: An account for future. Not active, yet.

FetLife.title: FetLife (@rahmetli) - 18+ (NSFW)
FetLife.text: A social network for the BDSM, Fetish & Kinky Community that I seldoml use.

LegalWarning.title: Legal Warning
LegalWarning.text: I would like to state that I do not grant permission for the use of any information about me, my direct or indirect contributions, or my real name—whether included or excluded—in any research, article, project, or actions involving financial gain, without compensation. Legal actions have been, and will be, initiated against any individuals or institutions that act otherwise. You are required to communicate with me verbally (face-to-face, directly) or in writing to work together on any of your projects or ideas. You must also refrain from any actions that could harm my physical integrity. No, I cannot hear your inner voice; you are hearing yourself. Testing or questioning my honesty and goodwill is strictly prohibited.
